description:
First published on November 2014

________________________________________________________________________

This Course Had More Than 1100 Delighted Students

- One Of The Most Important Things Is To Get The Fundamentals Right

- This Course Is Special Because It Teaches Using Step By Step Examples

________________________________________________________________________

30 DAYS 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEED FROM UDEMY

Not Happy With The Course? You Can Ask Your Money Back To Udemy Within 30 Days From Purchase, With A Simple Click

________________________________________________________________________

The course teaches you how to use SKETCH 3, which is probably the most powerful yet simple new generation design software available at the moment.

Sketch has been specifically created for APP and WEB DESIGN. That is why Sketch has been chosen by top designers at GOOGLE, DROPBOX, FACEBOOK and TWITTER among other top web companies and startups.

The course is designed to be taken by absolute beginners and is also valuable for intermediate designers who want to transition from other traditional softwares such as Photoshop, Illustrator and Fireworks.

Have fun !!! :)
title: Sketch 3 Basics and Step By Step Design Exercises
